entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 11:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
